articles.content: One of the best AirPods deals right now is courtesy of Amazon. Today, you can buy the latest Apple AirPods Pro for $200, saving you $49 off the usual price of $249. Widely regarded as far superior ea… [+1960 chars]

articles.title: Battle of the Noise-Canceling Kings: AirPods Pro 2 vs. Bose QC Earbuds 2 - CNET
articles.description: I tested these earbuds in and around London to see which is the noise-canceling champ.
articles.content: The Apple AirPods Pro 2 and Bose's QuietComfort Earbuds 2 are arguably two of the best noise-canceling earbuds available. I put them through a series of real-world tests to see which pair would come … [+651 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp for iOS gets picture-in-picture feature for video calls - TechCrunch
articles.description: WhatsApp is rolling out a picture-in-picture feature for its iOS app (version 23.3.77) with its latest update.
articles.content:
WhatsApp is rolling out a picture-in-picture feature for its iOS app with its latest update. This allows users to access WhatsApp or other apps without shutting out the video feed on the call.
